metadata.title: CVE-2019-15651 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: wolfSSL 4.1.0 has a one-byte heap-based buffer over-read in DecodeCertExtensions in wolfcrypt/src/asn.c because reading the ASN_BOOLEAN byte is mishandled for a crafted DER certificate in GetLength_ex.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+dfsg-2').
